001
002package com.commercetools.api.predicates.query;
003
004import java.util.Optional;
005
006import com.commercetools.api.predicates.ContainerPredicate;
007import com.commercetools.api.predicates.Predicate;
008
009public class ContainerQueryPredicate implements ContainerPredicate<QueryPredicate>, QueryPredicate {
010    private final QueryPredicate parent;
011
012    private final QueryPredicate inner;
013
014    private final boolean renderInnerWithoutParentheses;
015
016    public ContainerQueryPredicate() {
017        this.parent = null;
018        this.inner = null;
019        this.renderInnerWithoutParentheses = false;
020    }
021
022    public ContainerQueryPredicate(final QueryPredicate parent, final QueryPredicate inner) {
023        this(parent, inner, false);
024    }
025
026    public ContainerQueryPredicate(final QueryPredicate parent, final QueryPredicate inner,
027            final boolean renderInnerWithoutParentheses) {
028        this.parent = parent;
029        this.inner = inner;
030        this.renderInnerWithoutParentheses = renderInnerWithoutParentheses;
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public QueryPredicate parent() {
035        return parent;
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public QueryPredicate inner() {
040        return inner;
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public boolean renderInnerWithOutParentheses() {
045        return renderInnerWithoutParentheses;
046    }
047
048    public ContainerQueryPredicate parent(final QueryPredicate parent) {
049        return new ContainerQueryPredicate(parent, inner, renderInnerWithoutParentheses);
050
051    }
052
053    public ContainerQueryPredicate inner(final QueryPredicate inner) {
054        return new ContainerQueryPredicate(parent, inner, renderInnerWithoutParentheses);
055    }
056
057    public ContainerQueryPredicate renderInnerWithOutParentheses(final boolean renderInnerWithoutParentheses) {
058        return new ContainerQueryPredicate(parent, inner, renderInnerWithoutParentheses);
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Remove Parentheses from Inner if RenderInnerWithOutParentheses is true
063     * @return expression result as string
064     */
065    public String render() {
066        if (this.renderInnerWithOutParentheses()) {
067            return this.parent() != null
068                    ? String.format("%s %s", parent().render(),
069                        Optional.ofNullable(inner()).map(Predicate::render).orElse(""))
070                    : Optional.ofNullable(inner()).map(Predicate::render).orElse("");
071        }
072        return this.parent() != null
073                ? String.format("%s(%s)", parent().render(),
074                    Optional.ofNullable(inner()).map(Predicate::render).orElse(""))
075                : String.format("(%s)", Optional.ofNullable(inner()).map(Predicate::render).orElse(""));
076    }
077
078    public static ContainerQueryPredicate of() {
079        return new ContainerQueryPredicate();
080    }
081}
